title: Todd Gurley injury update: RB questionable, game-time decision for fantasy owners
content:
St. Louis Rams running back Todd Gurley is questionable for Week 2. We break down the fantasy implications. St. Louis Rams running back Todd Gurley (knee) is listed as questionable for the team's Week 2 matchup against Washington. Gurley was a full participant in practice…  
St. Louis Rams running back Todd Gurley is questionable for Week 2. We break down the fantasy implications. 

Tweet Share 

St. Louis Rams running back Todd Gurley (knee) is listed as questionable for the team's Week 2 matchup against Washington. Gurley was a full participant in practice on Thursday and Friday. Despite the full participation, the Rams are likely to continue to exercise extreme caution with their prized first-round pick. Even if Gurley does suit up, he's not likely to see a serviceable role for fantasy owners in his debut. 

Fantasy Spin: With Gurley slated for limited work at best, the question then becomes whether Tre Mason will suit up. Mason is listed as questionable but was also a full participant in practice on Thursday and Friday. Assuming…
